Content: Minister Mangala Samaraweera says that the Enterprise Sri Lanka Program has given the opportunity to youth to stand on their own feet without going behind politicians for jobs. The Minister said this while attending the Chief Executive Officers Summit 2018 organized by the Postgraduate Institute of Management of Sri Jayawardenapura University. Governor of the Central Bank Dr. Indrajith Kumaraswamy also expressed his views on the occasion.
